sub_title: Scrum Master | Facilitator & trainer | Project developer | Writer of The Liberation of the Masculine | Therapist & Process worker | Community Builder | Director Sh!ft Foundation
summary:
I am hardworking connector, an optimist, changemaker, always looking opportunities, sees links and connections easily, is a good listener and have the ability to connect to many people in the world by creating a friendly environment of trust and confidence. I help people to shift their perspectives and have the ability to connect to many people by creating a friendly environment of trust and confidence.

I have a wide experience in designing, organizing and facilitating programs and create conditions for deep listening. I am a social entrepreneur and initiator of social and collaborative projects in companies, governments and communities. I have built international, intercultural and inter sectorial bridges, combining a mind-driven experience in business and entrepreneurship with the heart-driven approach of connecting with people´s deeper motivations and human qualities. I have worked worldwide with project experience across Europe, South America (primarily Brazil), Southern Africa and the Caribbean.

I am a trainer and guide of personal transformation and group-processes, creating and applying tools, processes and experiences that allow people to liberate themselves and each other potential. Developer and writer of 'The liberation of the masculine', a tool for healthy masculinity.

education.field_of_study: CE - Commercial Economics - speciality media&entertainment management

certifications.name: Oasis Game and Elos philosophy facilitation

projects.title: Go Deep
projects.description:
In 2016 we created with 5 partner organizations across Europe the Go Deep Game. A game that transforms tensions in communities into opportunities for positive transformation. It brings together the community mobilization power of the Oasis Game and the systemic work and depth of Process work. We have developed and applied the game in 2016 and it has spread across Europe fastly. 

Go Deep is a game that is played by any group that is interested in the future of a community. It is a like a journey, where groups of people travel through the cards along imaginary metro lines to deepen their leadership and facilitation skills and create actions and community transformations for everyone

• Brings awareness about the diversity inside the participant and in the community, welcoming different ways to meet all the different parts inside the person and others
• Leads to new ways of thinking, doing, behaving, expressing feelings and offers new patterns of relationship.
• Raises awareness of what is needed to transform individuals, groups and communities and how to help that to happen and sustain the change.
• Bring fresh ways to work with deep community issues through the game.
• Supports the community to enjoy and promote its own growth and empowerment, 
• Promote the agency and independence of the individuals and community to achieve their own needs through healthy relationships.

projects.title: Community development in Holland, Caribean and Europe
projects.description: We've applied the Elos philosophy and the Oasis Game methodology in several communities worldwide, inviting communities to bring their talents, share their dreams and co-realize them with us to achieve widely carried, bottom-up and hands-on results with people and partners.

visual recorder, strategy visuals designer, biomimicry & permaculture student
Cultural Anthropologist | Trainer & Facilitator | Social Program developer | Focus on inclusive & regenerative leadership | Deep Democracy Instructor

profile_positions.description: Working as Scrum Master & Agile roles at Just Good People. Currently contracted as Scrum Master at Sociale Verzekerings Bank at the Transition team PBG2.0 in Utrecht.
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master & Agile coach

profile_positions.description:
In 2020 I co-founded the SH!FT Foundation, an organization for real life learning and awareness based (collective) action.

As director, senior-facilitator/trainer and project developer I have set up and facilitated various projects and programs that shift paradigms and perspectives, that breakthrough to new possibilities in oneself, in relations and in society. Experiences include; 

- Coordinator, senior facilitator and co-initiator of Grensverleggers, the Dutch national societal traineeship program for youth. In cooperation with House of Deep Democracy and 10 other partners we created and facilitate 10 week training & local action programs for youth between 18 and 28 to create interventions that tackle polarized issues in Dutch society. Currently 200 youth, youth workers and coaches have been trained and set up projects in the area of diversity and inclusion, gender, climate change and social entrepreneurship. Check www.grensverleggers.nu
 
- Trainer of 6 month online course of participatory methodologies for managers and professionals of the mining industry responsible for restauration and rebuilding community impacted by disasters. 

- Coordinator, developer and trainer of Don’t Worry Be You, an EU program to develop tools for youth and youthworkers to deal with mental health challenges in 6 countries. 

- Co-facilitator of Healing histories & Process Work, online seminars and workshops that bring process-oriented psychology, personal- and historical healing to practioners and professionals across the world.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder, project-coordinator, facilitator/trainer

profile_positions.description:
FairGround consultancy organizes and facilitates learning journeys and transformational development programs in different - community and organizational - contexts around the world. Specialized in community development, transformational personal and group learning, international exchange and development. Experiences include; 

E-motive program, an Oxfam funded program for reversed development work. Under this program Fairground brought a participatory community development method from Brazil to over 20 Dutch neighborhoods, called the Oasis Holland movement. 

Agency for CSR project and learning journeys, bringing together the businessworld with NGO´s and volunteering development projects, including (a.o.) leadership training in Brazil, sustainable tourism in Guatemala, employee volunteering in South Africa and Uganda. Clients included (a.o): Heinz, &Samhoud, PriceWaterhouseCoopers, L’oreal.

Winner of the Spark*- social entrepreneurship contest of the Dutch youth council for the idea of  voluntourism agency for consumer market in Suriname, Peru, Brazil, Guatemala, South Africa, Uganda, India and Sri Lanka.
profile_positions.title: Owner/director, social entrepreneur

profile_positions.description:
The liberation of the masculine is a profound set of cards focused on opening a dialogue and inner space about the world of the masculine. Made for men and women interested in masculine energies and qualities. The liberation of the Masculine invites the reader and user to discover ways to become freer of several beliefs, patterns and structures that have defined the masculine and the world for centuries. 

Using these cards I host men-circles and offer workshops for men & mixed gender groups, therapy and counseling to individuals and couples. 

For more information and purchase of the cards check www.theliberationofthemasculine.com
profile_positions.title: Writer & Developer of 'The Liberation of the Masculine'. Men-circles Facilitator and Therapist.

profile_positions.description: Co-creator of international foundation that focused on training practitioners, communities and organizations to setup and continue realizing participatory projects locally and inter-locally, with international cooperation in over 50 countries. In 2020 this foundation changed into the SH!FT Foundation.
profile_positions.title: Director, Co-founder, Senior Facilitator & Project Leader

profile_positions.description: Expansion and dissemination of the methodology worldwide through projects of international collaboration, with various partners and trained facilitators in 50+ countries.
profile_positions.title: Coordinator of International Expansion, Facilitator and Trainer

profile_positions.description:
International Product Manager, responsible for strategic decisions and market implementation of products of international repertoire in the Netherlands, based on market and competitor analysis. Representing artists of music labels such as Def Jam, Motown, Island and Geffen records.   

Radio & TV promotor responsible for maximizing PR, visibility and airplay for international artists in Holland, through managing media-relationships and organization of promotion tours.
profile_positions.title: Productmanager
